mapper.select: SELECT A.idx_report, B.job_no, A.report_id, A.title, LEFT(REPLACE(A.create_dt,'-','.'),16) AS create_dt, IF((A.d_count_total-A.d_count)=0,'생성완료','생성중') AS status_str FROM KT_REPORT A JOIN KT_PROJECT_JOB_PROJECTID D ON D.idx_project_job_projectid=A.idx_project_job_projectid JOIN KT_PROJECT_JOB B ON B.idx_project_job=D.idx_project_job ORDER BY A.idx_report DESC

SELECT A.title, B.summary0, LEFT(REPLACE(B.create_dt,'-','.'),16) AS create_dt, B.idx_report_data, A.idx_report FROM KT_REPORT A JOIN KT_REPORT_DATA B ON B.idx_report=A.idx_report WHERE A.idx_report=#{idx}
SELECT filepath, `filename` FROM KT_REPORT WHERE idx_project=#{idx_project}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(report_seq),0) AS report_seq FROM KT_REPORT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KT_REPORT (idx_project, idx_project_job_projectid, report_seq, report_id, title, filepath, `filename`, idx_user) VALUES (#{idx_project}, #{idx_project_job_projectid}, #{report_seq}, #{report_id}, #{title}, #{filepath}, #{filename}, #{idx_user})
INSERT INTO KT_REPORT (idx_project, idx_project_job_projectid, idx_user) VALUES (#{idx_project}, #{idx_project_job_projectid}, #{idx_user})
INSERT INTO KT_REPORT_DATA (idx_report, title, summary0, idx_user) VALUES (#{idx_report}, #{title}, #{summary0}, #{idx_user})
